Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackClickHandler
    The event handler for the board in the display where players click where they want to attack.
    AttackPhase
    This class creates the user interface of the main game where players take turns to attack each other's ships It's base layout is a BorderPane where only the center, bottom and left regions are used.
    BattleShipGUI
    Application of java fx starts here.
    BoardGUI
    Creates the display of the boards.
    MainMenuGUI
    The GUI of the game starts at the main menu where the players are prompted to set the settings of the game.
    Settings
    Settings for the game window and the game itself.
    SetupPhase
    The setup phase where players setup their ships in their board.
    SetupShipHandler
    Called when player clicks a button in the right panel.
